LanguageData.HEB.UnknownSkillsPassionsTip: {PAWN_labelShort} has not revealed {PAWN_possessive} skills and passions. Skills and passions will be revealed when resistance gets below {1}
LanguageData.HEB.UnknownBackstoryTipNew: {PAWN_labelShort} has not revealed {PAWN_possessive} backstory. Backstory will be revealed when resistance gets below {1}
LanguageData.HEB.UnknownTraitTipNew: {PAWN_labelShort} has not revealed {PAWN_possessive} trait. Traits will be revealed when resistance gets below {1}
LanguageData.HEB.UnknownIncapabilitiesTip: {PAWN_labelShort} has not revealed what work types {PAWN_pronoun} will do.
LanguageData.HEB.UnknownIncapabilitiesTipNew: {PAWN_labelShort} has not revealed what work types {PAWN_pronoun} will do. Work types will be revealed when resistance gets below {1}
LanguageData.HEB.SettingsVanillaBio: Resistance below this will use vanilla bio, allowing any other information that other mods add to the bio to be revealed. Note that this will reveal everything. Value
LanguageData.HEB.SettingsShowSkills: Resistance below this will show skills
LanguageData.HEB.SettingsShowTraits: Resistance below this will show traits
LanguageData.HEB.SettingsShowPassions: Resistance below this will show skills with passions
LanguageData.HEB.SettingsShowBackstory: Resistance below this will show backstory
